# Contributors

## Original Wiener Netze Smartmeter Integration

This project is based on the [Wiener Netze Smartmeter](https://github.com/DarwinsBuddy/WienerNetzeSmartmeter) integration. We are grateful to the original contributors whose work made this Netz NÖ adaptation possible:

### Original Authors and Contributors
* [DarwinsBuddy](https://github.com/DarwinsBuddy) - Original integration author
* [reox](https://github.com/reox)
* [TheRealVira](https://github.com/TheRealVira)
* [tschoerk](https://github.com/tschoerk)
* [W-M-B](https://github.com/W-M-B)
* [platysma](https://github.com/platysma) - vienna-smartmeter
* [florianL21](https://github.com/florianL21) - vienna-smartmeter fork

## Netz NÖ Smartmeter Contributors

### Current Contributors
* [TobiKr](https://github.com/TobiKr) - Netz NÖ adaptation

## I would like to join this list. How can I help the project?

We're currently looking for contributions for the following:

- Bug fixes
- Features
- Documentation improvements

For more information, please refer to our [CONTRIBUTING](.vscode/CONTRIBUTING.md) guide.
